Congratulatory letter to Kim Jong Il
    Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- The economic and commercial councillors' corps here sent a congratulatory letter to Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the 54th birthday of the DPRK.
 The letter was handed to an official concerned by Sergei Lyoushkin, commercial councillor of the Russian embassy, who is the doyen of the corps on Thursday.
